column4: If I try to run a 32-bit app on a 64-bit kernel, what is likely to happen?
is it going to run properly, just in 32-bit mode?   Or am I better off staying with 32-bit kernel if that's what the majority of my applications run in?
id say stick with 32bit if you want averything to be as smooth as possible :)
heh.  I've just gotg an AMD64 that never gets run out of 32-bit mode. :)  But i'm not using more than 3 gigs of memory so...
